parameter.name: projectId
parameter.description: Project ID of the project billed for the query.

parameter.name: kind
parameter.description: The resource type of the request.

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: A query string, following the BigQuery query syntax, of the query to execute.

parameter.name: maxResults
parameter.description: The maximum number of rows of data to return per page of results. Responses are also limited to 10 MB. By default, there is no maximum row count, and only the byte limit applies.

parameter.name: defaultDatasetId
parameter.description: A unique ID for this dataset, without the project name. The ID must contain only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), or underscores (_). The maximum length is 1,024 characters.

parameter.name: defaultProjectId
parameter.description: The ID of the project containing this dataset.

parameter.name: timeoutMs
parameter.description: How long to wait for the query to complete, in milliseconds, before the request times out and returns.

parameter.name: dryRun
parameter.description: If set to true, BigQuery doesn't run the job. Instead, if the query is valid, BigQuery returns statistics about the job. If the query is invalid, an error returns. The default value is false.

parameter.name: useQueryCache
parameter.description: Whether to look for the result in the query cache. The default value is true.
